name: Path (Owl_Skip)
description:
Code, Art & Music by Tim Sheinman

Weekly Challenge for Approaches to Play Class at Uni.

The brief was to make a game in which the goal was to get from A to B.

Although the brief asked for multiplayer, I opted for a single player version, as this would be easier to implement and for people to appreciate.

It is also easy to see how this game could be converted to a multiplayer game, either with different boards or two players on the same board.
